languages.text: "Вы несете чушь. При всех достоинствах Соломона, он никак не мог бы мне помешать, пожелай я избавиться от него и его арбитров и присвоить десятину".
"You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."
languages.original_text: "Вы несете чушь. При всех достоинствах Соломона, он никак не мог бы мне помешать, пожелай я избавиться от него и его арбитров и присвоить десятину".

traits.locale_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."
"You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."
"You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."
"You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."
"You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

languages.text: "Ihr redet Unsinn. Bei allem Respekt vor Solomornes Fähigkeiten, hätte ich ihn und seine Arbitratoren loswerden und den Zehnt stehlen wollen, hätte mich nichts davon abhalten können."
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr redet Unsinn. Bei allem Respekt vor Solomornes Fähigkeiten, hätte ich ihn und seine Arbitratoren loswerden und den Zehnt stehlen wollen, hätte mich nichts davon abhalten können."

languages.text: « Vous racontez n'importe quoi. Avec tout le respect que je dois à Solomorne, il aurait été bien incapable de m'arrêter si j'avais voulu me débarrasser de lui et de ses arbitrators pour voler la dîme. »
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: « Vous racontez n'importe quoi. Avec tout le respect que je dois à Solomorne, il aurait été bien incapable de m'arrêter si j'avais voulu me débarrasser de lui et de ses arbitrators pour voler la dîme. »

languages.text: “这简直是一派胡言。我倒不是说索罗蒙法务官能力不足，可如果我真的打算除掉他和他手下的法务官，夺走什一税，光凭他可阻止不了我。”
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是一派胡言。我倒不是说索罗蒙法务官能力不足，可如果我真的打算除掉他和他手下的法务官，夺走什一税，光凭他可阻止不了我。”

languages.text: «Eso no son más que sandeces. Con todo el debido respeto a las capacidades de Solomorne, de haber querido librarme de él y sus Arbitrator para robar el diezmo, no podría haberlo impedido».
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no son más que sandeces. Con todo el debido respeto a las capacidades de Solomorne, de haber querido librarme de él y sus Arbitrator para robar el diezmo, no podría haberlo impedido».

languages.text: 「馬鹿げている。ソロモーンの能力には敬意を表するが、もし{mf|俺|私}が彼と彼のアービトレイターたちを排除して租税を盗むつもりだったなら、彼に阻止されることなどありえなかった」
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: 「馬鹿げている。ソロモーンの能力には敬意を表するが、もし{mf|俺|私}が彼と彼のアービトレイターたちを排除して租税を盗むつもりだったなら、彼に阻止されることなどありえなかった」

languages.text: "Saçmalıyorsunuz. Solomorne'un kabiliyetlerini küçük görmüş olmayayım ama onu ve Yargıcılarını saf dışı bırakıp aşarı çalacak olsam kimse gıkını çıkaramazdı."
languages.original_text: "You are talking nonsense. With all due respect for Solomorne's capabilities, if I had wanted to get rid of him and his Arbitrators and steal the tithe, there is no way he could have stopped me."

traits.locale_text: "Saçmalıyorsunuz. Solomorne'un kabiliyetlerini küçük görmüş olmayayım ama onu ve Yargıcılarını saf dışı bırakıp aşarı çalacak olsam kimse gıkını çıkaramazdı."
